title: Flipped Learning-Based Self-Assessment Tool Design and Utilization Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of flipped learning models and familiarity with basic self-assessment methodologies
context.additional_context: Science-focused adult learner program emphasizing reflective practice and competency-based assessment in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners will explain a three-stage process for designing self-assessment tools in a flipped learning environment
Learners will generate ten self-assessment items aligned with European Higher Education Area (EHEA) standards
Learners will develop assessment tools with verified reliability (Cronbach’s α ≥ 0.7)
Learners will revise three or more learning strategies based on self-assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
